body:
Comment 3: 
Please resolve this ticket. IMHO,following two comment lines will be nice to have in
future env.bat.

@echo off
:: un-comment following line if you are behind a firewall.
::set http_proxy=http://gateway.test.com:1020/
PATH=%PATH%;c:\gobuild\mingw\bin;c:\gobuild\wix\bin;c:\gobuild\hg
